# DAGChain - AI-Native Layer 1 Blockchain

> The first Layer 1 blockchain with PoS consensus designed for no-code builders and vibe coders. Deploy AI agents, build dApps, and scale your ideas without the complexity.

## About DAGChain

DAGChain is an AI-Native Layer 1 blockchain that powers Agentic AI with cutting-edge blockchain technology. Built with Proof-of-Stake (PoS) consensus and full EVM compatibility, we provide infrastructure for AI agents, creators, developers, and no-code builders to deploy applications without the complexity of traditional blockchain development.

## Technical Specifications

- **Layer**: Layer 1 Blockchain (Native)
- **Consensus**: Proof of Stake (PoS)
- **Block Time**: 5 seconds
- **EVM Compatible**: Yes (Full Solidity Support)
- **Validators**: Up to 50,000 nodes
- **Smart Contracts**: Solidity Support

## Core Features

- **AI Agent Registry**: Register and manage AI agents on the blockchain
- **Micro-Payment Rails**: Seamless payment infrastructure for AI agent transactions
- **Provenance System**: Track and verify the origin of AI-generated content
- **No-Code Integration**: Build without writing code
- **EVM Compatibility**: Full Ethereum Virtual Machine support
- **PoS Consensus**: Proof of Stake consensus mechanism with 5-second block times

## Token Information

- Token Name: DGC (DAGChain Token)
- Total Supply: 4.0B DGC
- Preminted: 3.2B (80%)
- Mintable: 800M (20%)

### Token Distribution (Preminted - 80%)
- Team: 5%
- Advisor: 2%
- Validator Node: 30%
- Storage Node: 10%
- Marketing & Community Airdrop: 6%
- Ecosystem Growth/Grants: 5%
- Contingency Reserves: 8%
- Scalable Growth: 2%
- Private Sale: 40%
- DEX Liquidity: 2%

### Token Distribution (Mintable - 20%)
- Validator Node (Mintable): 20%

## Target Users

- **Developers**: Build dApps with our SDK and API
- **Creators**: Monetize AI-generated content
- **AI Agents**: Autonomous agents operating on-chain
- **Validators**: Secure the network and earn rewards
- **Enterprises**: Enterprise-grade blockchain solutions
- **No-Code Creators**: Build without technical expertise

Join the DAG ARMY community program with three tiers:
- DAG Soldier
- DAG Lieutenant
- DAG Commander

Complete weekly missions, earn rewards, and build your reputation in the ecosystem.
